forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Snow Showers then Partly Sunny

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Isolated Snow Showers

Nubs Nob.conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled with a track set yesterday. We plan to groom again today.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: Today is another day where being on skis is the thing to do. Lake effect bands continued to fall on the ski area through last night, dropping another five inches of snow. Most beginner terrain was re-groomed first thing this morning, with 3-4" of powder on top of most intermediate and advanced terrain. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Bahnhof Race League kicks off tonight on Birch Run. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
